text:
MÉTODO DE GAUSS PARA ANALIZAR UN SISTEMA DE ECUACIONES 4×4

\left\{\begin{array}{l}\n{x_{1}-x_{2}-x_{3}+a x_{4}=b} \\\n{x_{1}+x_{2}+x_{3}+x_{4}=0} \\\n{x_{1}-x_{2}+x_{3}-x_{4}=12} \\\n{x_{1}+x_{2}-x_{3}+x_{4}=-8} \\\n{a=? \quad b=?}\n\end{array}\right.[imath]{x_{1}-x_{2}-x_{3}+a x_{4}=b} [/imath] [imath]{x_{1}+x_{2}+x_{3}+x_{4}=0} [/imath] [imath]{x_{1}-x_{2}+x_{3}-x_{4}=12} [/imath] [imath]{x_{1}+x_{2}-x_{3}+x_{4}=-8} [/imath] [imath]{a=? \quad b=?}[/imath]
